headline.main: British Citizen Released in Saudi Arabia

docs.snippet: The foreign secretary of Britain, Philip Hammond, announced on Wednesday that Saudi Arabia would release a British man jailed for possessing alcohol....
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign secretary of Britain, Philip Hammond, announced on Wednesday that Saudi Arabia would release a British man jailed for possessing alcohol.

headline.main: Ferrari Production Cap Edges Higher, to 9,000 Units by 2019
headline.print_headline: Ferrari Production Cap Edges Higher, to 9,000 Units by 2019

docs.snippet: Ferrari Chairman Sergio Marchionne is edging Ferrari production higher as the luxury sports car brand prepares for a future as a stand-alone company....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ferrari Chairman Sergio Marchionne is edging Ferrari production higher as the luxury sports car brand prepares for a future as a stand-alone company.

headline.main: HUD Investigating Sex-For-Repairs Allegations in Baltimore
headline.print_headline: HUD Investigating Sex-For-Repairs Allegations in Baltimore

docs.snippet: Baltimore's housing commissioner says federal officials are investigating allegations that some maintenance men demanded sexual favors in exchange for repairs at city housing projects....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baltimore's housing commissioner says federal officials are investigating allegations that some maintenance men demanded sexual favors in exchange for repairs at city housing projects.

headline.main: International Prosecutors Decide Against Full Honduras Probe
headline.print_headline: International Prosecutors Decide Against Full Honduras Probe

docs.snippet: The International Criminal Court's prosecutor says she has decided against opening a full investigation into allegations of crimes following a 2009 coup in Honduras....
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court's prosecutor says she has decided against opening a full investigation into allegations of crimes following a 2009 coup in Honduras.

headline.main: Sheriff on Firing of Ben Fields

docs.snippet: Sheriff Leon Lott of Richland County, S.C., confirmed that Ben Fields, the officer caught on camera grabbing a student out of her chair had been fired for his conduct....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sheriff Leon Lott of Richland County, S.C., confirmed that Ben Fields, the officer caught on camera grabbing a student out of her chair had been fired for his conduct.

headline.main: EU Lawmakers Vote Against Using Farm Aid for Bullfighting
headline.print_headline: EU Lawmakers Vote Against Using Farm Aid for Bullfighting

docs.snippet: European Union lawmakers have declared their opposition to using farm subsidies to raise cattle for bullfighting....
docs.lead_paragraph: European Union lawmakers have declared their opposition to using farm subsidies to raise cattle for bullfighting.

docs.snippet: Fresh off their royal world premiere, "Spectre" stars Daniel Craig, Monica Bellucci and Christoph Waltz joined director Sam Mendes on the red carpet in Rome on Tuesday, where part of the latest James Bond installment was filmed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fresh off their royal world premiere, "Spectre" stars Daniel Craig, Monica Bellucci and Christoph Waltz joined director Sam Mendes on the red carpet in Rome on Tuesday, where part of the latest James Bond installment was filmed.

headline.main: Walgreens' profit up, buying Rite Aid
headline.sub: Walgreens' profit up, buying Rite Aid

docs.snippet: Walgreens Boots Alliance rings better-then-expected profit on cost-cutting. It says it'll save even more by buying Rite Aid. Fred Katayama reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Walgreens Boots Alliance rings better-then-expected profit on cost-cutting. It says it'll save even more by buying Rite Aid. Fred Katayama reports.

headline.main: James Blake Preps for Marathon, Discusses Police Brutality
headline.print_headline: James Blake Preps for Marathon, Discusses Police Brutality

docs.snippet: Former tennis pro James Blake is gearing up for his first marathon and said Wednesday it's going to be a long race, like the fight against police brutality....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former tennis pro James Blake is gearing up for his first marathon and said Wednesday it's going to be a long race, like the fight against police brutality.

headline.main: Texas Woman Used in 'Blood Ritual' While Being Held Captive
headline.print_headline: Texas Woman Used in 'Blood Ritual' While Being Held Captive

docs.snippet: Four people kidnapped a woman and held her captive for three days in a San Antonio-area home, forcing her to ingest drugs and at one point conducting a "blood ritual," a sheriff's spokesman said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four people kidnapped a woman and held her captive for three days in a San Antonio-area home, forcing her to ingest drugs and at one point conducting a "blood ritual," a sheriff's spokesman said Wednesday.
